```{r}
library("minimaxdesign")
```

```{r}
#20-point minimax design on design space [0,1]^2 constrained by given inequalities
is_valid_treatment = function(treatment){ 
    is_the_trt_valid = vector(mode = "logical", length = length(treatment))

    is_the_trt_valid[1] = (treatment[2] <= 0.6 - 2*treatment[1]) 
    is_the_trt_valid[2] = (treatment[1] >= treatment[2])
    return(all(is_the_trt_valid))
}
D <- minimax(N=20,p=2,region="ineq",const=is_valid_treatment)
plot(NULL,xlim=c(0,1),ylim=c(0,1),xlab="x1",ylab="x2") #set up plot
polygon(c(0,0.2,0.3),c(0,0.2,0),col="gray") #design space
points(D,pch=16) #design points
```
